pages.title: Atlantic Spadefish
pages.text: The Atlantic spadefish ($(o)Chaetodipterus faber$()) is a species of marine fish belonging to the family Ephippidae.$(br2)It is the symbol of the North Carolina Aquariums.

pages.title: Atlantic Spadefish
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★☆☆☆$(br2)Always active$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: minecraft:sea_grass$(br2)Number of Offspring: 4$(br2)Growth time: None Days
